title: Cartoony Font ID Help Please
content:
There are two fonts in this logo I need assistance with. Please see picture attached.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [VidaliaOnionFactory.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831092300/http:/typophile.com/files/VidaliaOnionFactory.jpg) | 41.79 KB |
author: glenwood

comments.content:
I suspect that VIDALIA ONION FACTORY is lettering rather than a single font. Fonts with elements found in the lettering include Blippo [http://www.myfonts.com/search/blippo/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831092300/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/blippo/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/blippo/fonts/") and Pump [http://www.myfonts.com/search/pump/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831092300/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/pump/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/pump/fonts/")  
Similarly for VIDALIA, GEORGIA you might tinker with Thats All Folks Bold [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/thats-all-folks/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831092300/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/thats-all-folks/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/thats-all-folks/")  
Don
Thanks Mike F. Seems you are both correct.
